article_node.title: Russia Signals Gas Pipeline Deal as Xi, Putin Deepen Ties
article_node.summary: Gazprom signed a legally binding agreement to build the Power of Siberia 2 pipeline to China, diverting gas sales from Europe. The deal, signed amid talks between Xi and Putin, could help China secure 30% of diverted gas and may counter U.S. tariff threats. India’s Modi also signals continued Russian oil purchases, challenging U.S. tariff policy.
